title: Gunder Frank vs David Christian Secondary MCQ 5

content.question: Which of the following best explains Europe’s ability to gain a greater share of global trade in the early modern period?

choices.label: Easing of tensions among European states
Adoption and improvement of maritime technologies by Europeans
Europeans’ increased interest in foreign languages and cultures
Diffusion of European manufacturing technology and processes to Asia

content.answer: Adoption and improvement of maritime technologies by Europeans

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
